scripts.test:chromeWeeklyDocker: mkdirp report && cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js --require src/step_definitions src/features --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --format json:report/cucumber_report.json --world-parameters "{\"browser\":\"docker.chrome\"}"; npm run report
scripts.test:debug: mkdirp report && cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js  --tags @debug --require src/step_definitions src/features --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --format json:report/cucumber_report.json --world-parameters "{\"browser\":\"chrome\"}"
scripts.test:pipeline: mkdirp report && cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js  --tags @debug --require src/step_definitions src/features --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --format json:report/cucumber_report.json
scripts.test:chrome: mkdirp report && cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js  --tags @bug --require src/step_definitions src/features --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --format json:report/cucumber_report.json --world-parameters "{\"browser\":\"chrome\"}"
scripts.test:firefox: mkdirp report && cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js  --tags @debug --require src/step_definitions src/features --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --format json:report/cucumber_report.json --world-parameters "{\"browser\":\"docker.firefox\"}" ; npm run report
scripts.test:edge: mkdirp report && cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js  --tags @debug --require src/step_definitions src/features --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --format json:report/cucumber_report.json --world-parameters "{\"browser\":\"edge\"}"
scripts.test:sandbox.chrome: mkdirp report && cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js  --tags @bug --require src/step_definitions src/features --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --format json:report/cucumber_report.json --world-parameters "{\"browser\":\"sandbox.chrome\"}"
scripts.test:chromeDaily: mkdirp report && cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js --tags @SmokeTests --require src/step_definitions src/features --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --format json:report/cucumber_report.json --world-parameters "{\"browser\":\"chrome\"}" ; npm run report
scripts.test:chromeWeekly: mkdirp report && cucumber-js --require cucumber.conf.js --require src/step_definitions src/features --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --format json:report/cucumber_report.json --world-parameters "{\"browser\":\"chrome\"}" ; npm run report
